text: People’s Energy is an energy supplier based in Shawfair, Scotland. ==History== Co-founders David Pike and Karin Sode launched a crowdfunding campaign in 2017 to launch the company with the promise of returning 75% of profits back to customers. On 31st July 2017, the company successfully raised £487,815 from 2,059 supporters in 199 days. The company received their Ofgem licence and launched in August 2017. ==Customer numbers== People’s Energy currently has 115,430 customers. ==Energy mix== People's Energy offers 100% renewable electricity. ==References== Category:Renewable energy companies of the United Kingdom Category:Companies based in Midlothian Category:2017 establishments in Scotland Category:British companies established in 2017
